data.title: Phil Johnston (Person)
data.meta_description: Philip Johnston is an American screenwriter, director, film producer, and voice actor best known for writing the screenplay for Walt Disney Animation Studios' Wreck-It Ralph  and Zootopia. He returned as the writer for the Wreck-It Ralph sequel, Ralph Breaks the Internet and as co-director of the film alongside Rich Moore.
